body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Perry Hotels customer service. My name is Lawrence Perry. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Virginia King.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's a pleasure to assist you, Virginia. Before we proceed, may I kindly ask for your date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is the fifteenth of March, nineteen ninety-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Virginia. Additionally, may I also have your home address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my home address is five four two Apple Street, Willow Creek.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Virginia. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss or address today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm a bit confused about the food quality during my recent stay at your hotel.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Virginia. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will investigate this matter further. Thank you for your time today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Virginia. Have a great day.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting Perry Hotels customer service. Goodbye.
